title: Janna Forecast Skin Crash
body:
Please help I just got the Janna forecast skin from hextech box and unlocked the skin to permanent,
but every time I use it when the game starts to load the game crashes every time, it only crashes when
I use the janna forecast skin.

replies.body: Oh snap that's no good. Let's try running a quick client repair through the options if you haven't yet. It sounds like her model files might be damaged or missing which is causing this crash, so repairing that file should fix things up!
